description:
Plok is here for his adventures in this Poly-Esta Archipelago implementation! 
Get ready to enjoy the classic SNES platformer and its iconic soundtrack. Plok is one of my favorite games and I've been excited to take this on.

aplok_v010.description:
Plok is here for his adventures in this Poly-Esta Archipelago implementation! 
Get ready to enjoy the classic SNES platformer and its iconic soundtrack. Plok is one of my favorite games and I've been excited to take this on.

### Updates
- Added item "Progressive Area Unplok" to allow for a more progressive stage unlock
- "Sleepy Dale Gift" location should work now
- Pressing L and R on the overworld will allow you to quickly switch between areas
- Switched to APProcedurePatch, game no longer needs ROM to generate
- Updated for Archipelago v0.6.4

If there any bugs or issues let me know

### Locations
- Stage Clears
- Bonus Stages
- Fruits
- Presents
- Plokontinue Letters
- Flea kills

### Items
- Region stage gates
- Extra Limbs
- Transformations
- Vehicles
- Spin Jump
- Amulet
- Max Health

### Setup Guide
The setup guide can be found on this page
[Plok Setup Guide](https://rentry.co/q7rpqhcp)
aplok_v010.title: Plok Archipelago V 0.1.0

plok_v011.description:
# Fixes
- Flashlight/Plok Flag/Flea Rope are no longer in the item pool when choosing the progressive unplok option
- Fixed an issue where the apworld would not work with archipelago 0.6.5

### Setup Guide
The setup guide can be found on this page
[Plok Setup Guide](https://rentry.co/q7rpqhcp)
plok_v011.title: Plok Archipelago V 0.1.1
